text: Edward Shane Lechler (born August 7, 1976 in East Bernard, Texas) is an American football punter for the Oakland Raiders of the National Football League (NFL). Lechler was drafted out of Texas A&M; University by the Oakland Raiders with the 142nd pick in the fifth round of the 2000 NFL Draft. ==Other websites== *Shane Lechler at nfl.com Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Oakland Raiders players Category:American football punters Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Shane Lechler
